description: This colourful salad requires very little cooking. Toss with the dressing at the last minute to prevent wilting.
name: Spicy Asian Chicken Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large carrot, shaved using a vegetable peeler

recipeInstructions.text: Poach the chicken in a large saucepan in plenty of simmering salted water for 7-10 minutes, depending on the thickness, until cooked through. Let cool, then thinly slice.
Whisk the lime juice, fish sauce, sugar, a pinch of salt, and the chilli flakes, if using, together, until the sugar dissolves.
Mix together the salad vegetables, most of the herbs, and the chicken. Mix in the dressing and scatter with the remaining herbs and the peanuts, if using, to serve.
